pageTitle: IND & COMM BK OF CHINA-H (IDCBF:OTC US): Stock Quote & Company Profile - Businessweek
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {12973=On June 26, 2015, ICBC and Baidu Online Network Technology (Beijing) Co., Ltd. signed a strategic cooperation agreement in Beijing, marking the official establishment of strategic partnership. ICBC and Baidu have reached intent of cooperation in Internet finance, map service, online marketing, financing business, life services, among others. Both parties plan to carry out in-depth cooperation in O2O platform, online payment, LBS service, mobile terminal development etc. and launch a series of innovative products and services with higher application value that better adapt to the market and meet customer demands. Meanwhile, ICBC will provide comprehensive, high-quality and efficient financial services such as intended financing and investment banking for Baidu and its associated enterprises and customers of Baidu platform. ICBC, based on its Internet finance infrastructure, by following up with information technology, is committed to building a new financial service model which is guided by the platform strategy, highlighted by intelligent financial services, characterized by online and offline interaction and supported by comprehensive application of Big Data. During the process, Baidu, with its substantial Internet resources and technology advantages, will inject new power into the e-ICBC brand development and bring to a higher level the integration and development of financial business and information technology,. ICBC and Baidu will continue to conduct more long-term, comprehensive, steady and profound cooperation in comprehensive finance, Big Data and other fields, and bring intelligent, smart and more satisfactory financial life for customers through enhancing core competitiveness of the two parties., 15065=Industrial and Commercial Bank of China Limited, Board Meeting, Jul 06, 2015. Agenda: To consider the proposal of engagement of accounting firm in 2016., 8082=Industrial and Commercial Bank of China Limited provides various financial products and services worldwide. It operates through Corporate Banking, Personal Banking, Treasury Operations, and Others segments. The Corporate Banking segment offers financial products and services to corporations, government agencies, and financial institutions. This segment’s products and services include corporate loans, trade financing, deposit-taking, corporate wealth management, custody activities, and various corporate intermediary services. The Personal Banking segment provides personal loans and cards, deposit-taking, personal wealth management, and personal intermediary services to individual customers. The Treasury Operations segment is involved in the money market transactions, investment securities, and foreign exchange transactions, as well as holding of derivative positions. The Others segment offers insurance and leasing services. The company also offers e-banking services, including Internet, telephone, mobile, and self-service banking services. Its distribution network consists of approximately 17,122 domestic institutions and 338 overseas institutions, as well as approximately 2,007 correspondent banks. The company was formerly known as Industrial and Commercial Bank of China. Industrial and Commercial Bank of China Limited was founded in 1984 and is based in Beijing, China.}
